card.name: GENJI Boy
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ This creature attacks each turn if able. ■ Whenever your Hunters attack, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has "blocker".

card.text: ■ Multi ■ Speed Attacker ■ World Breaker ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, if it wasn't summoned, shuffle it into your deck.

card.name: Father Earth
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into its owner's mana zone. Then choose a non-evolution creature from your opponent's mana zone. Your opponent puts that creature into the battle zone.
